content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0, 0)) with fuel inventory containing coal and producing iron plates.

### Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (2, 0)) with fuel inventory containing coal and producing copper plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace. For example, you received an error when trying to insert coal without having it in your inventory.

### Errors when inserting items into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. You encountered an error when trying to insert copper plates into a non-existent or incorrect target entity. Always check for nearby entities that can accept the items you are trying to insert.
